title: the Woodland Sentry
intro: When the Primordial Dragon fell, its soul was shattered into six fragments of avatars that would later be referred to as the Dragon Knights, or the Draconis siblings. Velerias is the first fragment and the eldest of the siblings, wielding the elemental power of plants and nature. Velerias is the life-bringer of the Dragon Knights. She does not just protect her allies with steel; she binds them with living roots and heals their wounds with the stolen vitality of her enemies.

abilities.name: Verdant Growth
abilities.details:
Every several seconds, Velerias's next basic attack with her scepter deals bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) and creates a small circle of Verdant Soil at her location for a short duration.

Allies standing on this soil are [bf]healed[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) for a small amount every second.

abilities.name: Root Bind
abilities.details:
Velerias thrusts her scepter forward, sending a line of sharp wooden briars through the earth, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) to the first enemy hit and [db]root[/] the target for a short duration.

If Velerias is standong on a Verdant Soil, the root duration is [db]increased[/].

In Wood Dragon form, the briars spread out in a wider area, dealing increased [ap]magical damage[/] and [db]rooting[/] all enemies hit instead.

abilities.name: Living Bark
abilities.details:
Velerias wraps herself and her lowest-health nearby ally hero in enchanted bark, granting both a [sh]shield[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) for a few seconds.

In Wood Dragon form, the [bf]shield strength[/] is increased and all nearby allies are also [sh]shielded[/] over the duration of the shield.

abilities.name: Thorn Embrace
abilities.details:
Velerias targets an enemy hero, tethering them to her scepter with a spectral vine for a few seconds.

While tethered, the enemy deals [bf]reduced damage[/] to Velerias while she continuously drains the target's [hp]health[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]).

At the end of the duration, the thorns grows out from the vine, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) and [db]rooting[/] the target for a short duration.

In Wood Dragon form, if the tether ends or the target dies, the vine bursts into life, [bf]healing[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) the nearest allied hero.

abilities.name: Forest Breaker
abilities.details:
Velerias transforms into an elder Wood Dragon form, gaining increased [bf]size[/], [bf]attack range[/] and [hp]maximum health[/].

In Wood Dragon form, her Verdant Soil [bf]radius[/] is larger and the [bf]healing[/] is increased.

All of Velerias's abilities are enhanced while in Wood Dragon form.
